name: 来自女巫森林的法师
description:
Plot summary: The protagonist Carl accidentally drifted through a waterfall 16 years ago to the hidden Witch Forest. Since adult men are not allowed to live here, the protagonist Carl had to prepare to leave the Witch Forest 16 years later.
And just before leaving the Witch Forest, Carl accidentally met the Goblin Mage. He was seriously injured. Carl, who was rescued by the Witch, found that his two closest witch elders were missing, and the other witches in the Witch Forest could not leave. Witch Forest, so when Carl left the Witch Forest, he was also burdened with the task of finding the two elders. Carl, who left the Witch Forest for the first time, holding a letter of recommendation given by the witch, is about to go to a magic academy near the Witch Forest. Here, Carl will gain a new identity while slowly getting in touch with the outside world and getting to know Many friends learn a wealth of magic knowledge. At the same time, Karl must guard the secrets of the witch forest and find the whereabouts of the two witch elders as soon as possible. In the process, Karl will also accidentally discover his secret...

Players will manipulate the protagonist Carl, experience Carl's story from Carl's perspective, advance the plot through dialogue, explore the map, and battle, and make their own choices. Due to the different choices of the players, Carl's fate will also change.

1. The game has multiple maps, including Witch Forest, Green School of Magic, Goblin Cave, etc., as well as large and small dungeons to satisfy players who desire to explore and collect.
　　 2. There will be many interactions between characters, and NPCs will have their own emotions. Different choices made by players when facing NPCs will affect the subsequent performance of NPCs in related plots.
　　3. How ending is the game?
　　 4. There will be a large number of hidden plots that require special conditions to open. The special conditions mainly come from the branch line and the choices made when facing the NPC.
　　 5. More plots will continue to be added in the future. Including main line, branch line and hidden plot.
　　6. ​​The game currently has several major professions, including magician, warrior, and nature witch; more professions will be added in the future, such as flame witch, paladin, and so on.
7. A unique alchemy system will be added to the game in the future. Players will be exposed to mysterious alchemy items in the plot. The effect will affect the trend of the plot and even an unexpected ending. Players can also refine alchemical items under special conditions, and have an independent evaluation system. The higher the evaluation, the stronger the effect of alchemical items.
8. The game has a team system. Players will gradually expand their team during the course of the game. The current team limit is 4 people.
9. The battle is turn-based. At the same time, there will be some special combat methods in the map, including chase, puzzle solving, maze and so on.
(Google Translator)
